links.title: Expected Market Moves For The Big Stocks - 7/22
links.description: The expected move that a stock makes is very important to know. The easiest way to get an idea of the move is to price a straddle at the close of trading on Friday. That is buying one call and one put at an ATM strike.

links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

links.title: TicToc on Twitter
links.description: Will post some charts later. But summary: 1. #ES_F had a stubby profile. Stubby don't mean weak. Or strong. It just means relaxing or tired. 2. $NQ_F > 7367 is +ve for $SPX 3. $VIX, #Bonds both had stubby profiles- tired 4. Key -ve is v steep drop in $VIX OI.

links.title: Forget Netflix, Cord-Cutters Love This One Company
links.description: Netflix is often seen as the face of the cord-cutting movement, a service where you can essentially stream what you want, when you want, for a reasonable monthly fee. With a massive content library that's about to get even larger as the company plans to spend $13 billion on new, original programming, Netflix is a cord-cutter's dream.
